item.description:
It's not January yet is it?? I can't stand those dark, gloomy days! Don't give in!! ...Join us Sunday, September 16th!

Hyannis to Nantucket is just one hour aboard the Steamship Authority High Speed. Cost is just $71 for the ferry round trip, including bike.

Two trips ago, we got someone to laugh till they peed in their pants and this past weekend someone hurled their lunch, they were having such a good time....ok, ok...I get carried away, slight exageration. But we had fun!!


Save the date....more details to follow!

Ride amount estimated at 30 miles with avg speed 12-17mph

Rob Fox, Organizer
item.name: Nantucket Anyone? Summer's NOT over YET!!
